sections.title: Chorus
content: The King of Glory comes, the nation rejoices;
Open the gates before him, lift up your voices.

sections.title: Verse 1
content: Who is the King of Glory; how shall we call him?
He is Emmanuel, the promised of ages.

sections.title: Verse 2
content: In all of Galilee, in city or village,
He goes among His people curing their illness.

sections.title: Verse 3
content: Sing then of David's Son, our Savior and brother;
In all of Galilee was never another.

sections.title: Verse 4
content: He gave His life for us, the Lamb of salvation,
He took upon Himself the sins of the nation.

sections.title: Verse 5
content: He conquered sin and death; He truly has risen,
And He will share with us His heavenly vision.
